trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" /> 類別的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase> class is used as a shared base between the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase>類別用做為共用的基底之間<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.TypeCodeDomSerializer>類別。

trans-unit.source: Public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> classes derive from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 公用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>類別衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Each public class defines its own public API.
trans-unit.target: 每個公用類別定義自己的公用 API。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase> class defines no public API, but does offer a multitude of utility methods that can be used to aid the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase>類別定義任何公用 API，但是也提供許多公用程式方法，可用來協助序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object that results from the expression.
trans-unit.target: 運算式產生的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" /> if there is no need to name the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要命名該物件，則可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to interpret.
trans-unit.target: 要解譯的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the given expression into an in-memory object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的運算式還原序列化為記憶體中物件。

trans-unit.source: An object resulting from interpretation of <paramref name="expression" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="expression" /> 之解譯所產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that derived classes can call to deserialize an expression.
trans-unit.target: 這是 helper 方法，衍生類別可以還原序列化運算式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It deserializes the statement by interpreting and executing the CodeDOM expression specified by the `expression` parameter, and then returns the results.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化解譯及執行所指定的 CodeDOM 運算式陳述式`expression`參數，然後傳回結果。

trans-unit.source: If an object needs to be created as a result of this expression, it will be given the name specified by the `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件必須先建立這個運算式的結果，會授與它所指定的名稱`name`參數。

trans-unit.source: The name can be `null` if there is no need to name the object.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可以是`null`如果不需要命名的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how specific expressions are handled.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何指定運算式的處理。

trans-unit.source: Expression
trans-unit.target: 運算式

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: This expression represents `this` or `Me`.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算式表示`this`或`Me`。

trans-unit.source: To locate the object that is associated with this expression, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeExpression%2A> method will look in the context stack for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>.
trans-unit.target: 找不到這個運算式中，與相關聯物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeExpression%2A>方法將會尋找內容堆疊中針對<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>。

trans-unit.source: This object contains the root object of the graph and the expression that represents it.
trans-unit.target: 此物件包含圖形和運算式，表示它的根物件。

trans-unit.source: If the object is present and the expression matches, the root object will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件存在，並且運算式比對，就會傳回根物件。

trans-unit.source: An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到執行個體，則會報告錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the target of the field reference evaluates to the root object, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> method of the manager parameter will be used to retrieve the object instance based on name.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位參考的目標評估為根物件，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>的管理員參數的方法將會用來擷取以名稱為基礎的物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, standard reflection is used against the target object to locate the requested field.
trans-unit.target: 否則，一般使用反映對目標物件找不到要求的欄位。

trans-unit.source: An error is reported if the field cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到欄位，會報告錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> method of the `manager` parameter is used to locate the instance representing the given variable name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>方法`manager`參數用來找出此執行個體表示指定的變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到執行個體，則會報告錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeExpression%2A> continues to interpret expressions until they are completely resolved to an object, or until it can no longer simplify the expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeExpression%2A> 會繼續解譯運算式，直到它們完全解析至物件，或直到它不再可以簡化的運算式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeExpression%2A> will return a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> that contains the most simplified expression.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeExpression%2A>會傳回<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>，其中包含最簡化的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The following expressions are not supported:
trans-unit.target: 不支援下列運算式：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the instance to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the constructor for <c>type</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 <c>type</c> 之建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: 已還原序列化物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add this object to the design container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將這個物件加入設計容器，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object must implement <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 物件必須實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，才能發生效用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeInstance%2A> method is invoked during deserialization to obtain an instance of an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeInstance%2A>取得物件的執行個體還原序列化期間叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: When this is called, an instance of the requested type should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫時，應該會傳回所要求類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A> method of the `manager` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會叫用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>方法`manager`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object from which the properties are to be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 要還原序列化其屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> array that filters which properties will be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 篩選要還原序列化之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes properties on the given object from the invariant culture’s resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 從不因文化特性而異的資源配套還原序列化指定物件上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializePropertiesFromResources%2A> method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializePropertiesFromResources%2A>方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It looks for properties on the given object and attempts to load their values out of the invariant culture’s resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 它會尋找指定的物件上的屬性，並嘗試載入它們的值，不因文化特性而異的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: This is generally used to handle design-time properties that are not emitted into source code.
trans-unit.target: 這通常用來處理不會發出至原始碼的設計階段屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not be used for localized properties because it only operates on the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 它應該不會用於當地語系化屬性因為它只作用於文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: This method inspects all of the properties of the `value` parameter that match the attributes specified by the `filter` parameter, and then checks for those properties in a resource binary object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查所有的屬性`value`參數符合指定的屬性`filter`參數，然後檢查這些資源的二進位物件中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for deserializing properties that cannot be represented in code, such as design-time properties.
trans-unit.target: 這可用於無法在程式碼，例如設計階段屬性中的還原序列化屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method requires that a designer loader offers an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to read resources.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要設計工具載入器提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>讀取資源。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> provides a <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader> for the invariant culture, then <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializePropertiesFromResources%2A> will read resources from the XML resource (.resx) file’s metadata section, which is not included in final compiled code.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>提供<xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader>的文化特性而異，然後<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializePropertiesFromResources%2A>會讀取 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔案的中繼資料區段不會包含在最終編譯的程式碼資源。

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, no resources will be read.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，將會不讀取任何資源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 要還原序列化的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" />。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes a statement by interpreting and executing a CodeDOM statement.
trans-unit.target: 藉由解譯並執行 CodeDOM 陳述式還原序列化陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeStatement%2A> method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.DeserializeStatement%2A>方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It interprets the `statement` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它可解譯`statement`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement> being deserialized will be pushed on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement>在還原序列化會推入內容堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: The target type.
trans-unit.target: 目標型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of attributes as defined in the project's target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性 (Attribute) 集合，即專案之 .NET Framework 目標版本中所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A collection of attributes as defined in the project's target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (Attribute) 集合，即專案之 .NET Framework 目標版本中所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: An object of the target type.
trans-unit.target: 目標型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of attributes as defined in the project's target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性 (Attribute) 集合，即專案之 .NET Framework 目標版本中所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A collection of attributes as defined in the project's target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (Attribute) 集合，即專案之 .NET Framework 目標版本中所定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: An object of the target type.
trans-unit.target: 目標型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes to pass to the target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (Attribute) 陣列，要傳遞至 .NET Framework 目標版本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of events as defined in the project's target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得如專案的 .NET Framework 目標版本中定義之事件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of events as defined in the project's target version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 事件集合，即專案之 .NET Framework 目標版本中所定義的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object for which to get an expression.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得運算式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定物件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> representing <paramref name="value" />, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no existing expression for <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> 表示 <paramref name="value" />，或表示 <see langword="null" /> (如果沒有 <paramref name="value" /> 的現有運算式)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method returns an expression representing the given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法會傳回代表指定之物件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: It can return `null`, indicating that no expression has been set that describes the object.
trans-unit.target: 它可以傳回`null`，這表示，沒有運算式已設定之描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: Expressions are acquired in one of three ways:
trans-unit.target: 運算式會取得在三種方式之一：

trans-unit.source: The expression could be the result of a prior call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 運算式可能在先前呼叫的結果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The expression could have been found in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>.
trans-unit.target: 運算式無法中已找到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>。

trans-unit.source: The expression could be derived through <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>.
trans-unit.target: 運算式無法衍生透過<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>。

trans-unit.source: To derive expressions through <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method queries the reference service for a name for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 若要衍生透過運算式<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法查詢參考服務中的指定物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the expression service returns a valid name, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method checks to see if there is a "." in the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算式服務傳回有效的名稱， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法會檢查是否有"。"的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the expression service found this object as the return value of a read-only property on another object.
trans-unit.target: 這表示運算式服務找到此物件的唯讀屬性的傳回值為另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a ".", <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> will split the reference into parts.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有"。"，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>會分割成組件的參考。

trans-unit.source: The leftmost part is a name that will be evaluated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 最左邊的部分是要評估與名稱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For each subsequent part, a property reference expression will be built.
trans-unit.target: 對於每個後續的部分，將建置屬性參考運算式。

trans-unit.source: The final expression will then be returned.
trans-unit.target: 最終的運算式，則會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If the object did not have an expression set, or if the object was not found in the reference service, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> will return `null`, indicating there is no existing expression for the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件沒有運算式設定，或是在參考的服務中，找不到物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>會傳回`null`，指出物件沒有現有的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得從型別中繼資料所產生的反映型別。

trans-unit.target: 反映型別，從 <paramref name="type" /> 的中繼資料所產生。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理員。

trans-unit.target: 要從中使用中繼資料的物件。

trans-unit.target: 取得從物件中繼資料所產生的反映型別。

trans-unit.source: A reflection type generated from the metadata of <paramref name="object" />.
trans-unit.target: 反映型別，從 <paramref name="object" /> 的中繼資料所產生。

trans-unit.source: The return value will not be equal to the type of object and should not be used for comparison with non-reflection types.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值不會等於物件的型別，並不應該用於非反映類型與比較。

trans-unit.source: Locates a serializer for the given object value or type.
trans-unit.target: 尋找指定物件值或型別的序列化程式。

trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.target: 指定要擷取之序列化程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Locates a serializer for the given object value.
trans-unit.target: 尋找指定物件值的序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" /> that is appropriate for <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 適合於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A> method is an extension to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A>方法是擴充功能<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method takes an object type, rather than an object value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會採用物件類型，而非物件值。

trans-unit.source: If an external party had overridden metadata for a specific object through <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>, that metadata override would not be seen by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which only takes a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果外部合作對象已覆寫透過特定物件的中繼資料<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>，該中繼資料覆寫會無法看到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，只接受型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A> method checks the metadata of the value and the value’s type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A>方法會檢查中繼資料值和值的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the two differ, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A> will look to see if there is a custom designer serializer attribute on the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個不同，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A>會查看是否有自訂設計工具的序列化程式屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: If so, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A> will attempt to use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A>會優先使用它。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will defer to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會由<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> specifying the serializer to retrieve.

trans-unit.target: 尋找指定型別的序列化程式。

trans-unit.target: 適合於 <paramref name="valueType" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A> method is an extension to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetSerializer%2A>方法是擴充功能<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method takes an object type, rather than an object value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetSerializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會採用物件類型，而非物件值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="valueType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type description provider service.
trans-unit.target: 型別描述提供者服務。

trans-unit.source: An object from which the type description provider service can be derived, if <c>provider</c> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>provider</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為可從中衍生型別描述提供者服務的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> that is aware of the target version of the .NET Framework, for use in type filtering.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />，此提供者會感知用於型別篩選的 .NET Framework 目標版本。

trans-unit.source: A .NET Framework-aware type description provider.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 感知的型別描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object for which the name will be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique name for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定物件的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: A unique name for <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetUniqueName%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetUniqueName%2A> 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetName%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method does not return a name, then <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetUniqueName%2A> uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService> to fabricate a valid name for the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法不會傳回一個名稱，然後<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetUniqueName%2A>使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>来由此物件的有效名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the service is not available, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetUniqueName%2A> will fabricate a name based on the short type name combined with an index number to make it unique.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務無法使用，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetUniqueName%2A>將由此根據 short 型別名稱結合的索引編號，使它成為唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The resulting name is associated with the serialization manager by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.SetName%2A> method before the new name is returned.
trans-unit.target: 產生的名稱是藉由呼叫相關聯的序列化管理員<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.SetName%2A>方法之前會傳回新的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the given object has been serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的物件是否已經序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for previous serialization.
trans-unit.target: 要測試先前序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the given object has been serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的物件是否已經序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> has been serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已序列化 <paramref name="value" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For the `value` parameter to be considered serialized, the `manager` parameter or another serializer must have called the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> method to create a relationship between `value` and a referring expression.
trans-unit.target: 如`value`視為參數序列化，則`manager`參數或另一個序列化程式必須先呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>方法來建立之間的關聯性`value`和參考的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for previous serialization.
trans-unit.target: 要測試先前序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include preset expressions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含預設運算式，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the given object has been serialized, optionally considering preset expressions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的物件是否已經序列化 (選擇性地考量預設運算式)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> has been serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已序列化 <paramref name="value" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For the `value` parameter to be considered serialized, the `manager` parameter or another serializer must have called the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> method to create a relationship between `value` and a referring expression.
trans-unit.target: 如`value`視為參數序列化，則`manager`參數或另一個序列化程式必須先呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>方法來建立之間的關聯性`value`和參考的運算式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <c>value</c> was fully serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>value</c> 已完全序列化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression representing the creation of the given object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回運算式，表示指定物件的建立。

trans-unit.source: An expression representing the creation of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <paramref name="value" /> 建立的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeCreationExpression%2A> method can be used to serialize an expression that represents the creation of the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeCreationExpression%2A>方法可用來將序列化代表建立運算式`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: It is aware of instance descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 它會感知執行個體描述項。

trans-unit.source: The `isComplete` parameter is set to `true` if the expression represents a fully configured object, or `false` if further serialization must be done on the object’s properties.
trans-unit.target: `isComplete`參數設定為`true`如果運算式代表完整設定的物件，或`false`如果序列化進一步必須對物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> or <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 或 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.target: 將事件序列化為的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to which <c>descriptor</c> is bound.
trans-unit.target: <c>descriptor </c> 繫結的目標物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> specifying the event to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 指定要序列化事件的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given event into the given statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的事件序列化至指定的陳述式集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> method is a helper method that derived classes can call to serialize a single event into the given <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A>衍生類別的 helper 方法可加以呼叫來序列化成單一事件的方法是指定<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> queries the serialization manager for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> for the given event, and then asks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> to serialize it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> 查詢的序列化管理員<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer>所指定的事件，並詢問<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer>序列化它。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> places the `statements` and `descriptor` parameters on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> 將`statements`和`descriptor`參數<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService> to discover event bindings to methods that are not compiled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> 需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService>探索事件繫結至未編譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: If this service is not present, event bindings to non-compiled methods will not be written.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務不存在，將不會寫入事件繫結至未編譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: Event bindings to compiled methods will still be serialized if the objects to which the events are bound can be converted into expressions.
trans-unit.target: 如果要將事件繫結的物件可以轉換為運算式，仍會序列化事件繫結至已編譯的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" />, <paramref name="value" />, <paramref name="statements" />, or <paramref name="descriptor" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" />、<paramref name="value" />、<paramref name="statements" /> 或 <paramref name="descriptor" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService" /> 無法使用。

trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.target: 將事件序列化為的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The object on which events will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化其上事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> array that filters which events will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 篩選要序列化之事件的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified events into the given statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的事件序列化至指定的陳述式集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvents%2A> method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvents%2A>方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It looks at events on the `value` parameter that match the `filter` parameter, and then it calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A> method for each event.
trans-unit.target: 它會查看事件`value`參數，它符合`filter`參數，然後呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvent%2A>每個事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvents%2A> method places the <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for `value` on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeEvents%2A>方法上的芳鄰<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>如`value`上<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" />, <paramref name="value" />, or <paramref name="statements" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /><paramref name="value" /> 或 <paramref name="statements" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> into which the properties will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 將屬性序列化為的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The object on which the properties will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 屬性將在其上序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> array that filters which properties will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 篩選要序列化之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the properties on the given object into the given statement collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定物件上的屬性，序列化至指定的陳述式集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperties%2A> method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperties%2A>方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It looks at properties on the `value` parameter that match the `filter` parameter, and then it calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperty%2A> method for each property.
trans-unit.target: 它會查看屬性`value`參數，它符合`filter`參數，然後呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperty%2A>每一個屬性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperties%2A> method places the <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for `value` on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperties%2A>方法上的芳鄰<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>如`value`上<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" />, <paramref name="value" />, or <paramref name="statements" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: The object whose properties will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要將其屬性序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> array that filters which properties will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 篩選要序列化之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the properties on the given object into the invariant culture’s resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 將指定物件上的屬性序列化為不因文化特性而異的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializePropertiesToResources%2A> method is a helper method that derived classes can call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializePropertiesToResources%2A>方法是在衍生類別的 helper 方法可以呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It looks at properties on the `value` parameter that match the `filter` parameter, and then it serializes the properties into the invariant culture resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 它會查看屬性`value`參數，它符合`filter`參數，然後將內容序列化至的文化特性而異的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: If the resource service returns a <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter>, the property values will be stored in the metadata section of the XML resource (.resx) file.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源服務傳回<xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter>，屬性值會儲存在中繼資料區段的 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔。

trans-unit.source: The `statements` parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: `statements`不使用參數。

trans-unit.source: To be serialized as a resource, a property must be simple (not a content property) and its value must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: 若要序列化為資源，屬性必須是簡單 （而不是內容屬性），而且其值必須是可序列化。

trans-unit.source: Properties that do not conform to this pattern will be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 將略過不符合此模式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializePropertiesToResources%2A> requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to obtain a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> to write resources for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializePropertiesToResources%2A> 需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>取得<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>寫入而異的文化特性的資源。

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, no resources will be written.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，則會不寫入任何資源。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" />, <paramref name="value" />, or <paramref name="statements" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /><paramref name="value" /> 或 <paramref name="statements" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.target: 將屬性序列化為的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />。

trans-unit.target: 屬性將在其上序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperty%2A> method retrieves a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer> for the `propertyToSerialize` parameter and delegates to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperty%2A>方法擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberCodeDomSerializer>如`propertyToSerialize`參數和它的委派。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperty%2A> places the `statements` and `propertyToSerialize` parameters on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeProperty%2A> 將`statements`和`propertyToSerialize`參數<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>。

trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource bundle into which <c>value</c> will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化 <c>value</c> 的資源配套名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化為使用指定資源名稱的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource bundle under the given name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>方法是 helper 方法，會將序列化值，以指定的名稱下的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: The culture that the resource is written to is determined by searching the serialization manager’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties%2A> collection for a property called `ResourceCulture`.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資源的文化特性由搜尋序列化管理員的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties%2A>集合中的之屬性呼叫`ResourceCulture`。

trans-unit.source: If this property exists, resources will be written to that culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性存在，會將資源寫入該文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, resources will be written to the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會將資源寫入文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數必須是可序列化。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to obtain a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> to write resources for the correct culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> 需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>取得<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>寫入正確的文化特性的資源。

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>會改為建立代表資源的程式碼中的二進位物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="ResourceCulture" /> is a read-write property that is accessed through the serialization manager’s <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ResourceCulture" /> 是讀寫屬性，透過序列化管理員的存取<see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.Properties" />集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager,System.String,System.Object)" /> method never changes the value of this property; it merely reads it to identify the culture to which it will write.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager,System.String,System.Object)" />方法永遠不會變更這個屬性的值; 它只會讀取該識別則會寫入的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The property is set during deserialization as resources are parsed and loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在還原序列化期間設定的屬性，因為會剖析和載入資源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource bundle into which <c>value</c> will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化 <c>value</c> 的資源配套名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化為使用指定資源名稱的資源配套。

trans-unit.source: The resource is always written to the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 資源就一定會寫入到文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數必須是可序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResourceInvariant%2A> method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService> to obtain a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> to write resources for the correct culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResourceInvariant%2A>方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IResourceService>取得<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>寫入正確的文化特性的資源。

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服務無法使用，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>會改為建立代表資源的程式碼中的二進位物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into an expression.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化為運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> object if <paramref name="value" /> can be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以序列化 <paramref name="value" /> 則為 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> 物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter can be `null`, in which case a primitive expression will be returned.
trans-unit.target: `value`參數可以是`null`，在此情況下會傳回原始的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A> method uses the following rules for serializing types:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A>方法會序列化型別使用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: It first calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method to see if an expression has already been created for the object.
trans-unit.target: 它會先呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>若要查看運算式是否已建立物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: If so, it returns the existing expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，它會傳回現有的運算式。

trans-unit.source: It then locates the object’s serializer, and asks it to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 然後，找出物件的序列化程式，並讓其進行序列化。

trans-unit.source: If the return value of the object’s serializer is a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>, the expression is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的序列化程式傳回值是<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>，則會傳回運算式。

trans-unit.source: It makes one last call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> to see if the serializer added an expression.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫最後一個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>以查看是否序列化程式新增運算式。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: If no expression could be created and no suitable serializer could be found, an error will be reported through the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法建立沒有運算式，而且找不到任何適合的序列化程式，則會報告錯誤，透過序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: No error will be reported if a serializer was found but it failed to produce an expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到序列化程式，但它無法產生運算式，將會不報告任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In this case, it is assumed that the serializer either already reported the error or it did not attempt to serialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，它會假設序列化程式已報告錯誤，或是它未嘗試序列化物件。

trans-unit.source: If the serializer returned a statement or a collection of statements, those statements will not be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列化程式傳回的陳述式或陳述式集合，這些陳述式不會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A> method will first look for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext> on the context stack and add statements to the statement context object's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext.StatementCollection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A>方法將會先尋找<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext>內容堆疊，並將陳述式加入至陳述式內容物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext.StatementCollection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If there is no statement context, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A> method will look in the context for a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> and add the statements there.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有陳述式內容，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A>方法將會尋找的內容中<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>然後加入那里的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: If no place can be found to add the statements, an error will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有地方可以找到加入陳述式，將會產生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: You should not call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A> method within <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService.Serialize%2A> when serializing your own object.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A>方法內<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService.Serialize%2A>當您將自己的物件。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If it returns `null`, create your own expression and call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果它傳回`null`，建立您自己的運算式和呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Then proceed with the rest of your serialization.
trans-unit.target: 然後繼續進行其餘部分的序列化。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object into an expression.
trans-unit.target: 將物件序列化為運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into an expression.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化為運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> containing <paramref name="value" /> as a serialized expression.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />，含有做為已序列化運算式的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>方法是 helper 方法，會將序列化資源運算式的值。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A> method, which writes a value to a resource binary object.
trans-unit.target: 這是相對於<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeResource%2A>方法，將值寫入資源二進位物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> goes one step further and returns an expression that can be used to recover the resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> 進一步移一個步驟，並傳回可用於復原之資源的運算式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the return value might be "rm.GetValue("SomeBitmap");".
trans-unit.target: 例如，傳回的值可能是 「 rm。GetValue("SomeBitmap");"。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource is calculated from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>, if one can be found on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: 資源的名稱會計算從<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>，如果找到一個內容堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> method will look on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack> for the following objects:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>方法將會尋找<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>下列物件：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>—a collection of statements to add a resource manager to, if one needs to be declared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>— 若要加入資源管理員，如果您需要將宣告陳述式集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>—the root expression, which is needed to create a resource manager.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.RootContext>— 根運算式，但需要建立資源管理員。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>—used to fabricate a name for the resource and to decide what type of resource manager call to make.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ExpressionContext>— 用來製造資源的名稱，以及決定何種類型的資源管理員呼叫進行。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to serialize into the invariant culture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示序列化為不因文化特性而異，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the given object into an expression appropriate for the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件序列化為適於不因文化特性而異的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> containing <paramref name="value" /> as a serialized expression.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />，含有做為已序列化運算式的 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: If the `ensureInvariant` parameter is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A> method will also write the resource value into the invariant culture’s resource file if the current `ResourceCulture` is not the invariant culture..
trans-unit.target: 如果`ensureInvariant`參數是`true`、<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToResourceExpression%2A>方法將也寫入資源值而異的文化特性資源檔如果目前`ResourceCulture`不是文化特性而異...

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件與運算式的關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> with which to associate <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>value</c> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an expression.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件與運算式的關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> method is a helper method that associates a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> with an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>方法是 helper 方法相關聯的<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>的物件。

trans-unit.source: Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 與這種方式中的運算式相關聯的物件都是可透過存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> 內容堆疊上的附加物件以儲存其運算式的資料表，因此也可存取的任何序列化<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="manager" />, <paramref name="value" />, or <paramref name="expression" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /><paramref name="value" /> 或 <paramref name="expression" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 供序列化使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> with which to associate <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <c>value</c> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify a preset expression; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示指定預設運算式，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an expression, optionally specifying a preset expression.
trans-unit.target: 使物件與運算式產生關聯，也可以指定一個預設的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> method is a helper method that associates a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> with an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>方法是 helper 方法相關聯的<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>的物件。

trans-unit.source: Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 與這種方式中的運算式相關聯的物件都是可透過存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A> stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SetExpression%2A>附加物件內容堆疊上以儲存其運算式的資料表，因此也可存取的任何序列化<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.GetExpression%2A>方法。
